text: Mousa Dembele (born 16 July 1987) is a Belgian former professional football player. He was a winger. He made over 400 league appearances over an 18-year career. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Club Season League National cup League cup Continental Other Total Division Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Germinal Beerschot 2003–04 BFD 1 0 0 0 – – – 1 0 2004–05 19 1 3 1 – – – 22 2 Total 20 1 3 1 – – – 23 2 Willem II 2005–06 Eredivisie 33 9 1 0 – 2 0 3 1 39 10 AZ 2006–07 33 6 5 4 – 12 4 2 0 52 14 2007–08 33 4 1 0 – 6 1 – 40 5 2008–09 23 10 3 2 – – 2 0 28 12 2009–10 29 4 1 2 – 6 0 4 0 40 6 Total 118 24 10 8 – 24 5 8 0 160 37 Fulham 2010–11 Premier League 24 3 2 1 2 1 – – 28 5 2011–12 36 2 1 0 1 0 7 0 – 45 2 2012–13 2 0 0 0 0 0 – – 2 0 Total 62 5 3 1 3 1 7 0 – 75 7 Tottenham Hotspur 2012–13 Premier League 30 1 2 0 0 0 10 1 – 42 2 2013–14 28 1 1 0 3 0 9 1 – 41 2 2014–15 26 1 2 0 5 0 7 0 – 40 1 2015–16 29 3 2 0 0 0 4 1 – 35 4 2016–17 30 1 3 0 0 0 6 0 – 39 1 2017–18 28 0 4 0 2 0 6 0 – 40 0 2018–19 10 0 0 0 1 0 2 0 – 13 0 Total 181 7 14 0 11 0 44 3 – 250 10 Guangzhou City 2019 CSL 26 1 0 0 – – – 26 1 2020 11 0 0 0 – – – 11 0 2021 8 0 0 0 – – – 8 0 Total 45 1 0 0 – – – 45 1 Career total 459 47 31 10 14 1 77 8 11 1 592 67 ===International=== :Source: Belgium Belgium Belgium Year Apps Goals 2006 6 1 2007 7 3 2008 4 0 2009 9 1 2010 5 0 2011 6 0 2012 7 0 2013 11 0 2014 6 0 2015 1 0 2016 5 0 2017 6 0 2018 9 0 Total 82 5 :Source: International goals International goals International goals International goals International goals International goals International goals #
